from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from event_manager import *
import time
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
import sys
import uselect
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

event_manager.reset()

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

def on_event_timer_callback_W_g_z_s_M():
  global Cmd, RT, RH, hex2, led, speed
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  RT = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  RH = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RT)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*c')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(8, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RH)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(12, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(14, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('')
  print((''.join([str(x3) for x3 in [''.join([str(x) for x in ['!1:', 'H', ':', RH, '#']]), ''.join([str(x2) for x2 in ['!1:', 'T', ':', RT, '#']]), '', '', '', '', '']])), end =' ')

event_manager.add_timer_event(10000, on_event_timer_callback_W_g_z_s_M)

def read_terminal_input():
  spoll=uselect.poll()        # Set up an input polling object.
  spoll.register(sys.stdin, uselect.POLLIN)    # Register polling object.

  input = ''
  if spoll.poll(0):
    input = sys.stdin.read(1)

    while spoll.poll(0):
      input = input + sys.stdin.read(1)

  spoll.unregister(sys.stdin)
  return input

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin2.pin, 4)

def on_event_timer_callback_L_N_I_b_b():
  global Cmd, RT, RH, hex2, led, speed
  Cmd = ''
  Cmd = read_terminal_input()
  if not len(Cmd):
    pass
  else:
    if Cmd[0] == 'H':
      hex2 = Cmd[1 : ]
      if led == 1:
        tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb(hex2))
    if Cmd == 'A':
      led = 1
      tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb(hex2))
      aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 1)
      aiot_lcd1602.putstr('')
      aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 1)
      aiot_lcd1602.putstr('ON')
    if Cmd == 'B':
      led = 0
      tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
      aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 1)
      aiot_lcd1602.putstr('OFF')
    if Cmd[0] == 'F':
      speed = int((Cmd[1 : ]))
      pin10.write_analog(round(translate(speed, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
      aiot_lcd1602.move_to(12, 1)
      aiot_lcd1602.putstr(speed)

event_manager.add_timer_event(200, on_event_timer_callback_L_N_I_b_b)

if True:
  display.scroll('Hi')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(2, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Starting...')
  display.scroll('OK')
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('LED ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(8, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Fan')
  hex2 = '#FFFFFF'
  led = 0

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
name: IOT Advance Home
